data.name: Employee of The Month
data.detailed_description:
Salary : €9 - €11 an hour

Become a member of The Month, a rural market store that provides for local communities. Staff here provide a friendly shopping experience for customers, answer questions and offer suggestions. Responsibilities may include :

  • Working to accomplish goals
  • Operating the cash register in a fun and efficient manner
  • Stocking shelves
  • Cleaning the store and general maintenance
  • Helping customers find their favorite products
  • You'll learn a lot. You're not stuck doing one task here. Each Crew Member contributes to creating a WOW customer experience by participating in all aspects of the job.

If you have a passion for money, we'd love to meet you. We can teach you the rest.
The Month is an equal opportunity employer and is committed to hiring damn near anyone.

NOTE : Must have a flexible schedule.
- Manger


  • First person exploration with unique and unsettling environments.
  • Play with Mouse & Keyboard or Controller.
  • Retro-inspired graphics.
  • Interactable and readable objects at every corner.
  • Multiple endings and modes.


Employee of the Month contains mature themes and scenes of explicit violence, gore and bad language.

data.short_description: An atmospheric retro inspired survival horror game. Enjoy the late shift at 'The Month' in an abstract and unsettling night of terror, spooks and convenience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • Additional Notes: Not entirely accurate, we are too broke to test. Sorry.

content_descriptors.notes: Employee of the Month contains mature themes and scenes of explicit violence, drug use, gore and bad language.
